thread.title: Maqbool Salmaan’s next focuses on friendships
thread.title_full: Maqbool Salmaan’s next focuses on friendships - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Maqbool Salmaan’s next focuses on friendships
text:
Maqbool Salmaan's Appuram Bengal Ipparum Thiruvathamkoor will tell a tale of friendships. Apart from the Matinee actor, the movie would also have Rajan P Dev's on Unni and Rajeev Rajan doing supporting roles.
Maqbool tells us, "It's a story about three guys and their friendships. The story also focuses on a group of Bengalis who live next door."
The actor is all set to be part of a big project led by Mammootty . The film, directed by Renji Panicker's son Nithin, will go on floors by January.
